text: Fuzzy the Hero ( and ) is a 1973 Italian-Spanish western film directed by Tulio Demicheli, composed by Coriolano Gori and starred by Eduardo Fajardo, John Bartha and Roberto Camardiel. == Cast == == References == == External links == * Category:Films directed by Tulio Demicheli Category:Spanish Western (genre) comedy films Category:Italian Western (genre) comedy films Category:Italian films Category:1973 films Category:Films scored by Lallo Gori Category:1970s Western (genre) comedy films Category:1973 comedy films
title: Fuzzy the Hero
